channel.title: Req
channel.description: HOW DO I MAKE MY CLIENT A JAR IVE DOWNLOADED JAR MAKER AND WHEN I CREATE IT AND TRY TO OPEN IT IT JUST MAKES THE ERROR NOISE PLEASE HELP ILL BE REALY GRATEFULL

item.title: Req
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

HERE IS WHAT I USE SIR

@echo off
jar cmf ..\data\manifest.txt ..\app.jar *.class sign\*.class models\*.gz javazoom\jl\converter\*.* javazoom\jl\decoder\*.* javazoom\jl\player\*.* javazoom\jl\player\advanced\*.*
jarsigner -keystore data\store -storepass rgb98up -keypass rgb98pp app.jar Client

HERE IS MY MANIFEST

Main-Class: Gui

[break very important sir]

AND YOU WILL NEED TO CREATE YOUR OWN KEYSTORE FILE USING JARMAKER LTD

THANK YOU VERY MUCH

OVER AND OUT

The cook from runescape
